import React, { useState } from 'react' const PopupCard = ({ visible, setVisible, country }) => { let RenderedCurrency if (country) { console.log(true) RenderedCurrency = country.currencies.map((currency) => { return

{currency}

}) } return (

More About the Country

) } export default PopupCard
